author: KarolWes
title: Magicful Wizard
review:
It's really nice set. The dark red hood looks fantastic with "angry" version of face. The secondary face is standard, looks like this in movie or on the pack. The body and legs' print are done well too. It's the only one set, which has a Teapot of Tyrahn (gold teapot with small flame). The minifig has also two "magic whirl" represented by 2x2 dishes with kind of lighting print.

I think this set is very worth buying, especially for someone who collect a Ninjago minifigs.
